Highlights: Good for: Dullness/Uneven Texture; Good for: Loss of firmness; Clean at Sephora; Good for: Anti-Aging; Good for: Dark spots; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
What it is: A serum that defends against pollution and environmental stressors—delivered with a bronzy glow.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness


Formulation: Lightweight Liquid


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Cocoa Extract: Rich in phytocompounds and provides powerful antioxidant and soothing benefits.

- Platinum Peptides: Reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while promoting visible elasticity.

- Chronocyclin: Mimics the antioxidant benefits of vitamin D for more youthful-looking skin.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: This serum’s just-got-back-from-somewhere-sunny glow flatters every complexion—without the long-term consequences of sun exposure. A blend of oils and vitamin F balances the skin’s healthy barrier, polyphenols and platinum peptides strengthen the skin, and a chronopeptide mimics vitamin D’s antioxidant benefits.


This serum is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.


Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.


Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.


Clinical Results:

In a consumer-perception study with 32 people after 28 days:

-90% agreed skin felt smooth

-87% agreed skin felt soothed and hydrated

Product Name: B-Hydra™ Intensive Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid
Long Description:
What it is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture


Formulation: Lightweight Serum


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Pineapple Ceramide: Boosts luminosity and improves the appearance of skin‘s texture and tone.

- Provitamin B5: As a humectant, it attracts hydration to the skin and holds it there, visibly improving skin‘s barrier function.

- Sodium Hyaluronate: With a smaller molecular weight than hyaluronic acid, it is able to penetrate skin and deliver intense hydration to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and promote visible firmness.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with biocompatible ingredients like provitamin B5, pineapple ceramide, and a lentil/apple/watermelon complex, this lightweight serum—which has a pH level of 5.7—delivers steady hydration all day as it visibly diminishes drabness, dryness, and fine lines. Your skin will appear healthier, brighter, and more youthful.


This serum is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.


Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.


Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.


Award win:

- Women‘s Health, 2019 Best Hyaluronic Acid Serum


Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study with 29 people after 8 weeks:

-97% agreed skin felt smoother

-93% agreed skin felt more hydrated

-93% agreed skin looked more radiant

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.


Clinical Results:

In a consumer-perception study with 34 people after immediate application:

- 91% agreed O-Bloos looked natural on their skin tone

- 88% agreed skin felt replenished

- 85% agreed skin looked moisturized

Product Name: T.L.C. Framboos™ Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum
Highlights: Good for: Dullness/Uneven Texture; Good for: Pores ; Clean at Sephora; Good for: Anti-Aging; AHA/Glycolic Acid; Good for: Acne/Blemishes
Long Description:
What it is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Dullness


Formulation: Lightweight Serum


Highlighted Ingredients:

- T.L.C. Framboos™ AHA Blend: Resurfaces and exfoliates skin for a smoother-, more even-looking complexion.

- Salicylic Acid (BHA): Loosens sebum to unclog pores while soothing skin.

- Raspberry Fruit Extract: Rehydrates and soothes skin with antioxidants.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: With a blend of glycolic, tartaric, citric, and salicylic acids, T.L.C. Framboos™ delivers chemical exfoliation without dryness or sensitization, curbs excess oil, and reveals clarity and luminosity. It enhances the performance of other products by clearing the way for maximum absorption. It also has a pH of 3.5.


It’s free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.


Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—that’s what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation).

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant skincare is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.


Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study with 30 people, after 4 weeks:

- 96% agreed skin felt smoother

- 90% agreed the product restored bounce, clarity, and radiance to skin and that skin’s texture steadily improved

- 83% agreed the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and discoloration improved and their complexion looked more even

Long Description:
What it is: A potent 15 percent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve the signs of photoaging.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity


Formulation: Lightweight Serum


Highlighted Ingredients:

- L-Ascorbic Acid: improve fine lines, wrinkles, and hyperpigmentation and help brighten skin

- Ferulic Acid: protects against UV-generated free radicals

- 1.0% Tocopherol: aka vitamin E, helps maintain moisture levels, and soothes irritation


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: C-Firma™ is designed to be mixed by you before its first use, which maximizes the potency of its ingredients while keeping the formula fresh. An antioxidant complex of l-ascorbic and ferulic acids, and vitamin E, reveal radiance, luminosity and an even-looking complexion as it hydrates and soothes.

When worn under your sunscreen during the day, C-Firma™ Fresh works hard to ward off pollution and UV-generated free radical damage. C-Firma™ Fresh is formulated at a skin-friendly pH of 2.5.

Proven to maintain nearly 95% of active Vitamin C for one year after mixing.

*Results based upon 12-month real time data.

It is 100 percent free of essential oils, silicones, colorants, and fragrance.


Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—that’s what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of Drunk Elephant’s products except their sunscreen Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, keeping it safe.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.


Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.


Clinical Results: In a clinical study with 30 people after 4 weeks:

-100% showed improvement in skin’s tone and radiance

-96% showed improvement in overall hyperpigmentation

-93% showed smoother skin texture

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—that’s what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

- 100% showed improvement in firmness and elasticity

Highlights: Good for: Dullness/Uneven Texture; Good for: Loss of firmness; Clean Plus Planet Positive; Vitamin C; Good for: Dark spots; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
What it is: A 10% vitamin C serum that visibly brightens, targets dark spots, and reduces hyperpigmentation with a waterless formula that’s gentle on skin.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity


Formulation: Serum


Highlighted Ingredients:

- L-Ascorbic Acid 10%: Visibly brightens, evens skin tone, and tightens the look of skin.

- Alpha Arbutin 1% and Ferulic Acid: Target the look of dark spots and hyperpigmentation while enhancing the benefits of vitamin C.

- Upcycled Tangerine Peel and Sugar Beet: Hydrate and boost the skin’s moisture and visible radiance.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.


What Else You Need to Know: A 10% vitamin C serum that’s shown to visibly brighten, firm, and target the look of dark spots. 10% L-ascorbic acid, the purest form of vitamin C, is powered by a waterless technology for maximum stability and potency until the very last drop. 1% alpha-arbutin and ferulic acid visibly even skin tone and reduce the look of hyperpigmentation, while upcycled tangerine peel hydrates and boosts moisture without irritation.


This formula is both water-free and oil-free. The primary base is Propanediol, although it's not an oil, it feels similar in texture and dries down to provide a unique, silky-smooth feeling on the skin.


Clinical Results: In a clinical study of the 10% Waterless Vitamin C Serum with 33 participants over 8 weeks, users reported:

- Visibly brighter skin after 1 use

- Serum was gentle on skin after use 2x daily


In a clinical study of 10% Waterless Vitamin C Serum with 33 participants based on 4-8-week improvement:

-16x improvement in size and intensity of dark spots

-2x improvement in skin tone evenness

Highlights: Vegan; Good for: Redness; Clean at Sephora; Fragrance Free; Good for: Acne/Blemishes; Alcohol Free
Long Description:
What it is: A lightweight, pH-balancing serum to help visibly reduce redness and irritation for softer, clearer-looking, and happier skin.


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Hypochlorous Acid: This acid is naturally produced by the body's immune system as a first line of defense to fight the appearance of redness and defend against bad bacteria. When applied topically, it soothes, purifies, and cares for sensitive or stressed skin—leaving it looking clear, soft, and healthy.

- Water and Sodium Chloride: This isotonic (non-drying) solution is formulated to mimic the makeup of our own bodies—it is the optimal delivery solution for hypochlorous acid since it is found naturally in your white blood cells.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is gluten-free and cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: Powered by a concentrated dose of stable hypochlorous acid, a heroic anti-inflammatory and anti-bacterial, this intensive, skin-saving serum is on a mission to help soothe and purify chronically sensitive skin (blemishes, rosacea, eczema, etc.) and strengthen the skin barrier. The innovative pump whips the formula from liquid to gel in real time for the most effective delivery. It's fragrance-free (but smells like science), derm-approved, and has the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance™.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state. Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation).


Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Product Name: Targeted Pores Serum with BHA + PHA
Highlights: Vegan; Good for: Pores ; Clean Plus Planet Positive; Fragrance Free; Salicylic Acid; Best for Oily, Combo, Normal Skin
Long Description:
What it is: An unscented, vegan serum powered by six percent salicylic acid and PHA that helps tighten the look of pores and mattify skin.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes

Formulation: Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- BHA (Salicylic Acid): From natural origin and extracted from the gaultheria tree, this acid is known for its purifying properties.
- PHA: From natural origin and extracted from corn, this acid is known for its exfoliating properties.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: The Targeted Pores Serum, powered by six percent BHA and PHA, visibly tightens pores and exfoliates with 96 percent natural-origin ingredients.

Clinical Results: In a use-test on 22 volunteers:
- 95% found their skin mattified after 1 application

In a use-test on 20 volunteers, after 28 days of use:
- 85% found pores looked clearer 
- 90% found their skin looked clearer

Long Description:
What it is: An exfoliator that works beneath the surface of the skin to help unclog pores, target blackheads and reduce excess oil.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Oiliness, Pores, and Acne and Blemishes

Formulation: Lightweight Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Salicylic Acid 2%: Helps to gently exfoliate the skin and unclogs pores to reduce blemishes.
- Zinc Compound 1%: Helps control oil.
- Mutli Molecular Hyaluronic Acid 1%: Helps to hydrate and plump skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Oil soluble, this BHA serum exfoliates the skin and cleans beneath the surface to fight blackheads and breakouts. BHA is great choice for oilier skin as its anti-inflammatory and anti-bacterial properties can help calm breakout prone skin.

Product Name: Mini Charlotte’s Magic Serum with Vitamin C
Highlights: Good for: Loss of firmness; Vitamin C; Good for: Pores ; Hydrating; Best for Dry, Combo, Normal Skin; Niacinamide
Long Description:
What it is: A Vitamin C and Polyglutamic Acid anti-aging serum that reduces appearance of dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles, visibly brightens, and plumps skin for flawless makeup application.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dark spots, pores, and loss of firmness and elasticity


Formulation: Lightweight Serum


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Golden Vitamin C: This more stable form of vitamin C evens and brightens skin tone more thoroughly than traditional vitamin C.

- Polyglutamic Acid: Four times more hydrating than hyaluronic acid, it acts as a plumper-looking skin filter to reduce appearance of fine lines.

- Niacinamide 5%: Minimizes the appearance of pores, improves visible skin texture and tone.


Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.


What Else You Need to Know: With 28 years of experience working with all skin types, Charlotte knows what people want and need to achieve their best skin. Her passion to deliver efficacious solutions led her to work with expert scientists, leading dermatologists, and facialists to formulate a serum with groundbreaking ingredients.


Clinical Results: In a clinical study of 209 people over 4 weeks:

- 92% agree the redness of their skin is reduced

- 91% agree pores appear tighter and more refined

- 94% agree skin looks and feels firmer
Ingredients:
-Golden Vitamin C: Visibly evens and brightens skin’s tone.
-Polyglutamic Acid: Acts as a visibly plumping skin filter to reduce the appearance of fine lines.
-Niacinamide 5%: Minimizes the appearance of pores and improves the look of texture and tone.

Aqua/Water/Eau, Niacinamide, Glycereth-26, Triheptanoin, Glycerin, Methyl Gluceth-20, Silica, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Quartz Powder, Amethyst Powder, Ruby Powder, Gold, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Polysorbate 20, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Octyldodecyl Oleate, Benzyl Alcohol, Myrothamnus Flabellifolia Leaf Extract, Peg-100 Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Schisandra Chinensis (Magnolia) Fruit Extract, Carbomer, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Saussurea Involucrata Callus Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Polyglutamic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Octyldodecanol, Sodium Benzoate, Propanediol, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Xanthan Gum, Parfum (Fragrance), Plumeria Alba Flower Extract, Plumeria Rubra Flower Extract, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylyl Glycol, Copper Gluconate, Hydrated Silica, 1,2-Hexanediol, Citric Acid, Solanum Tuberosum (Potato) Pulp Extract, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-11, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9, Dehydroacetic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Glutathione, Limonene, Geraniol, Citronellol, Linalool, Citral.

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines, Wrinkles, and Uneven Texture

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Co-Q10: An antioxidant working to protect the skin from environmental stress, like pollution.
- Syn-Tacks™: A dual peptide that helps improve elasticity while firming.
- Squalane: Provides lightweight hydration.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is also cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Not only protecting the skin from environmental stress, with added syn-tacks dual peptide and squalane, this light, hydrating serum also helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Long Description:
What it is: A vitamin C serum rich in antioxidants that nourishes the skin, visibly evens skin tone, supports the skin barrier, and helps protect from free-radical damage.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Kakadu Plum (Vitamin A, C, and Polyphenol): Visibly brightens, tones, and protects the skin from free radicals.
- Dragon Fruit (Packed with Complex of Minerals—Magnesium, Zinc, and Calcium): Helps support skin barrier and hydrates, leaving skin glowing.
- Pomegranate Rich in Omega 5 (Punicic Acid) and Essential Omega 6: Helps to soothe and encourage fresh-feeling skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This is a superfruit serum that visibly reduces the signs of photoaging, such as fine lines, wrinkles, dullness, and pigmentation. It is formulated to limit irritation and combines three types of vitamin C with glycogen and hyaluronic acid for the ultimate radiant glow.

Clinical Results
Clinically proven to significantly brighten and even skin in just 14 days*.
✓ Clinically proven to even skin tone and smooth skin texture in 14 days*.
✓ Clinically proven to visibly reduce the appearance the wrinkles in 14 days*.
✓ Helps skin to look firmer**

*Proven by a clinical study on 49 men and women.

Product Name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Treatment Face Oil
Highlights: Salicylic Acid; Good for: Pores ; Best for Oily, Combo, Normal Skin; Best for Combination Skin; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A quick-absorbing, medicated dry oil to clear congested pores, treat and prevent acne, and smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for clearer, smoother skin.

Solutions for:
- Acne and blemishes
- Blackheads
- Pores

If you want to know more…
With 1.5 percent salicylic acid, this fast-acting, quick-drying, medicated oil clears acne and blackhead-causing buildup and debris from congested pores for smoother, blemish-free skin. Tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil support clear skin, while hexylresorcinol and licorice naturally brighten the appearance of old acne discolorations for a more even-toned complexion.

Counterbalancing the potentially drying effects of salicylic acid, milk thistle, and cucumber seed oil nourish the skin and smooth the appearance of lines and wrinkles, without leaving a greasy residue. Chamomile and neroli soothe stressed, blemish-prone skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
"When I formulated U.F.O., I wanted to create a dry oil that practically disappears into the skin, leaving oily skin smooth (but never greasy) and yet effectively treated for blemishes and blackheads. Salicylic acid is notoriously over-drying, leaving your skin stripped and looking irritated. By infusing salicylic acid into clarifying oils (like tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil), the drying effects of salicylic acid are nipped in the bud, while all of the treatment aspects (like clearing congested pores and managing blackheads and blemishes) are in full-force. U.F.O. is part of the new Green Line, along with Martian Mattiyfing Melting Water-Gel Toner, created specifically for oily skin clients."—Sunday Riley
Ingredients: Silybum Marianum (Milk Thistle) Seed Oil, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Seed Oil, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Linum Usitatissimum (Flax) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Ethyl Linoleate, Hexylresorcinol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Salicylic Acid, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Citrus Paradisii (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Flower Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Amino Esters-1, Amber Leaf Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Lawsonia Inermis (Henna) Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Pearl Powder, Moringa Pterygosperma Seed Oil.

- Uneven skin tone

If you want to know more…
Vitamin C acts as an effective antioxidant, brightens the skin tone, and reduces visible signs of aging. Ascorbyl tetraisopalmitate is an oil-soluble and extremely stable derivative of vitamin C. It is provided in this oil format formula in combination with vitamin F, also known as essential fatty acids. Aside from the general benefits of pure vitamin C, ascorbyl tetraisopalmiate has been shown to offer enhanced skin brightening benefits.

- Phthalates

This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without alcohol, silicone, nuts, gluten, and fragrance. It comes in UV-protective packaging.

Product Name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA
Highlights: Good for: Dullness/Uneven Texture; Vitamin C; Clean at Sephora; Good for: Anti-Aging; Good for: Dark spots

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dark Spots

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Unique 20% Vitamin C Blend: A fast-acting, moisturizing vitamin C derivative absorbs quickly into skin to fight aging from daily free radical assault; helps support surface cell turnover for firmer looking skin while also improving moisture levels; remains in skin longer, helping to protect skin from oxidation and reduce UV damage for brighter skin over time.
- Mild Fruit AHAs 10%: Gentle yet effective acids remove debris and the buildup of dead skin cells for smooth, radiant skin; derived from seven fruits (apple, grapefruit, orange, lemon, lime, hawthorn, and jujube).
- Japanese Angelica Root Extract: An edible plant prized for centuries in herbal medicine for its recovery benefits, it helps reduce the appearance of dark spots, discoloration and post-acne scarring from the source; helps to diffuse accumulated excess melanin, a cause of hyperpigmentation, resulting in visibly more even skin tone.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and free of gluten, silicone, oil, and fragrance. It comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This clean, kind-to-skin formula with two types of vitamin C stabilized by antioxidant-rich Japanese beautyberry helps reveal a translucent, youthful glow. Mild fruit AHAs resurface dull, uneven skin, while Japanese angelica root helps to reduce the look of dark spots and post-acne scarring.

Clinical Results: Based on an expert grade study of 20 women:
- In 1 week, see smoother, more radiant skin
- In 4 weeks, see a visible improvement in overall skin tone
- In 8 weeks, see an improvement in skin texture and the appearance of fine lines

And, with hyaluronic acid, this multi-acid serum helps reinforce the skin’s moisture barrier. Plus you’ll love this serum’s minimal, naturally derived orange scent that was rigorously tested for safety, toxicity, and allergens.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

- Bakuchiol: This retinol-like botanical active demonstrates the same level of efficacy as retinol without redness or irritation, is proven to support the production of collagen, and diminishes the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and photodamage.

- Rambutan: This gentle, botanical active effectively targets fine lines and wrinkles while visibly supporting skin's elasticity.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.


What Else You Need to Know: Ideal for first time retinol users, this lightweight serum helps support natural collagen, smooth texture, and increase radiance. Formulated with our Phyto-Retinol Blend™—a hydrating cocktail of retinol and soothing botanicals like bakuchiol, rambutan, and ferulic acid— to provide enhanced results without irritation.


Clinical Results: In a 4-week clinical study conducted on 40 subjects with Fitzpatrick Skin Types I–VI:

- 100% saw smoother and less oily skin with no irritation in just 1 week

What Else You Need to Know: The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; and until now, SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Long Description:

What it is:

An all-in-one skin-perfecting night serum made with a natural retinol alternative that targets fine lines, wrinkles, pores, and dark spots, while instantly brightening.


Solutions for:

- Fine lines and wrinkles

- Pores

- Dullness and uneven texture


If you want to know more…

Say "hello results, goodbye retinol" with bakuchiol, a plant-based retinol alternative. This groundbreaking age-defying serum, powered with AHAs and bakuchiol—a natural alternative to retinol— fights all major signs of aging and more. It targets fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots, visibly firms, and reduces the look of pores. Enriched with edelweiss stem cell, a delicately beautiful and resilient flower that thrives in harsh conditions, this potent day serum also helps firm and improve elasticity. With hibiscus flower extract, it dramatically evens skin tone and texture. Plus, its lavender tint instantly brightens to awaken a fresher, more youthful-looking Ole Glow®!


What else you need to know:

Ole was inspired by the dramatic age-fighting benefits retinol delivers, but wanted to find a natural alternative. He selected bakuchiol, derived from the Ayurvedic babchi herb, after learning that it delivers retinol-like youth-boosting benefits—and is suitable for use during the day. This serum’s skin-brightening lavender tint is inspired by the babchi plant’s delicate flowers.


Research results:

In a consumer study on 36 women, after 12 weeks:

- 97% of users agree this product visibly brightens skin

- 97% of users agree this product renews skin

- 92% of users agree this product evens skin texture

- 83% of users agree this product smooths the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

- 94% of users agree this product improves skin firmness

- 92% of users agree this product improves skin elasticity

- 94% of users agree this product dramatically improves skin tone

- 92% of users agree this product dramatically improves skin texture

Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban. All skincare, hair, and makeup brands with the Clean Seal have less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

-Bakuchiol: Derived from the Ayurvedic babchi plant; a natural retinol alternative that helps even skin tone, smooth texture, and target fine lines and wrinkles

- 91% presented improvement of firmer skin

Product Name: Mini Intral Inner Youth Rescue Serum
Highlights: Hydrating; Best for Dry Skin; Good for: Redness; Good for: Dryness; Salicylic Acid; Without Parabens
Long Description:
What it is: A daily skincare essential that preserves youthful-looking skin by addressing and preventing skin sensitivity.

Skin Type: Dry

Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Redness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- BioC6: Inhibits a sensitivity-intensifying response by 97 percent.
- Resveratrol Pro Complex: Actively fights sensitivity and helps restore skin’s healthier state faster.
- Bio-Optimizers: Target sensitivity at all stages within the skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil.

What Else You Need to Know: With an ultra-lightweight, fast-absorbing texture, this supercharged formula combines amplified botanical actives with scientifically advanced ingredients for fast, visible results. Intral Inner Youth Rescue Serum quickly soothes skin sensitivity while enhancing and protecting a more youthful and healthy-looking complexion. Skin is immediately hydrated, looks more radiant, and has a smoother, more refined texture. Additionally, fine lines appear reduced, and the skin barrier is strengthened.

Traditionally, sensitivity has been known to happen in two stages. The first is sensitivity onset, when the exposome initiates alarms within the skin that trigger irritation and visible redness. Second is sensitivity amplification, which sees the cascade of damaging irritation signals within the skin that intensify visible redness. More recently, researchers discovered a third stage, sensitivity correction, when skin naturally and automatically produces soothing lipids to address sensitivity. Intral's Calm Complex, now with BioC6, is even more advanced with amplified botanicals peony, hawthorne, chamomile, panthenol, polysaccharide, and new ingredient pink rock rose which inhibits a sensitivity-intensifying response by 97 percent. Supported by eight years of testing and laboratory trials, the Resveratrol Pro Complex with resveratrol and salicylic acid contributes to a 34 percent increase in a key booster of skin’s natural soothing lipids to actively fight sensitivity and help restore skin’s healthier state faster. To target sensitivity at all stages within the skin, Intral Inner Youth Rescue Serum uses Bio-Optimizers, a delivery system that helps the actives' bioavailability within the formula.

Clinical Results: In a clinical trial with 26 women:
- Visible redness was reduced within 1 hour after application

In a clinical trial with 20 women:
- Fine lines were plumped and skin hydration increased 222% immediately after application

In a clinical trial with 20 women
- 100% of participants showed a strengthened skin barrier 4 hours after application
Ingredients:
-BioC6: Inhibits a sensitivity-intensifying response by 97 percent.
-Resveratrol Pro Complex: Actively fights sensitivity and helps restore skin’s healthier state faster.
-Bio-Optimizers: Target sensitivity at all stages within the skin.

Product Name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum
Highlights: Clean at Sephora; Best for Dry, Combo, Normal Skin; Good for: Dryness; Hydrating; Without Parabens
Long Description:
What it is: An oil-infused liquid serum created to deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-looking skin that’s visibly plumped with moisture.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Lightweight Oil

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Plant-Derived Squalane: Protects skin and prevents moisture loss.
- Water Phase: Helps to soothe, calm and hydrate.
- Oil Phase: Nourishes and softens.

What Else You Need to Know: This serum is the fastest way to dewy-looking skin: With a few shakes, two potent phases transform into a silky serum, balancing water, and oil to give thirsty skin exactly what it needs. It is formulated with rosewater, damask rose, and lightweight oils—including plant-derived squalane—to hydrate without a greasy finish.

Clinical Results: In a self-assessment on 61 subjects for 4 weeks:
- 100% said their skin was hydrated and visibly plumped with moisture
- 98% felt their skin was nourished
- 97% noticed their skin felt replenished and more supple

Highlights: Vegan; Good for: Loss of firmness; Collagen; Hypoallergenic; Without Parabens ; Best for Dry, Combo, Normal Skin
Long Description:
What it is: A vegan collagen serum for face, eyes, neck, and décolleté to help visibly firm, smooth, and reduce intense lines and wrinkles in 10 days.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity


Formulation: Liquid


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Patented Alguronic Acid®: Helps reduce the look of lines and wrinkles and fights environmental damage.

- Active Vegan Collagen™: Helps support and condition the skin to visibly plump and improve the look of texture and suppleness.

- Microalgae Oil: Hydrates, nurtures, and visibly restores radiance for a softer look.


Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and gluten-free.


What Else You Need to Know: This serum is formulated with patented Alguronic Acid to address visible signs of aging, proprietary Active Vegan Collagen™ to mimic restorative benefits of animal-derived collagen, and microalgae oil to hydrate. It’s all you need to support and condition, visibly improving firmness, suppleness, and radiance.


Clinical Results: Results obtained following self-assessments of 85 women, using the product twice daily:

- 94% said it deeply replenishes and helps condition skin in 10 days

- 91% said it restored bounce, resilience, and suppleness to the skin in 10 days

- 91% said skin is visibly nourished and appears healthy and youthful in 10 days


Results obtained in a clinical study of 22 participants using product twice daily (individual results may vary):

- 160% average measured increase in skin elasticity in the neck area in 28 days

- 100% of subjects showed a measured increase in skin firmness and elasticity in the neck area in 28 days

- 100% of subjects showed a measured increase in skin firmness in the cheek area in 28 days
Ingredients:
-Patented Alguronic Acid®: Helps reduce the look of lines and wrinkles and fights environmental damage.
-Active Vegan Collagen™: Helps support and condition the skin to visibly plump and improve the look of texture and suppleness.
-Microalgae Oil: Hydrates, nurtures, and visibly restores radiance for a softer look.

Collagen (Vegan)*, Water (Aqua, Eau), Propanediol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Betaine, Pentylene Glycol, Dextrin Palmitate, Collagen Amino Acids (Vegan)*, Parachlorella Beijerinckii Exopolysaccharides, Chlorella Protothecoides Oil, Helichrysum Stoechas Flower Extract, Cylindrotheca Fusiformis Extract, Niacinamide, Tocopherol, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Adenosine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Palmitic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Amodimethicone, Homosalate, Polysorbate 20, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Octocrylene, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Beta-Carotene (CI 40800).

*Vegan collagen is a new, innovative technology created by binding together corn, soy, and wheat protein fibers resulting in vegan amino acids that structurally mimic and provide a function similar to animal-derived collagen used in cosmetic products.

Product Name: Sensitive Skin Treatment Drops Calming Vitamin B Serum
Highlights: Good for: Redness; Good for: Dullness/Uneven Texture; Clean at Sephora; Fragrance Free; Hypoallergenic; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
What it is: A calming serum formulated with four types of vitamin B to soothe and visibly reduce irritation while improving skin’s resilience over time.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Redness and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Probiotic Extracts: Improve smoothness and strengthen the skin barrier.
- Prebiotics (Beet Root): Hydrate and balance skin.
- Vitamin B3 Niacinamide: Promotes even skin tone.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This clean and effective formula includes three additional types of vitamin B: B5 panthenol, B6 pyridoxine, and B7 biotin. Superfoods like ginger, aloe, cucumber, oats soothe skin to reduce the look of redness, while green carrot helps calm sensitive skin. This formula does not contain live cultures.

Clinical Results: In a self-assessment on 32 subjects, during 6 weeks:
- 90% agreed skin felt stronger and more resilient
- 90% saw more radiant-looking skin
- 87% agreed serum visibly reduces redness and irritation

A lightweight, oil-free, antiaging treatment that improves visible signs of aging.

What it is formulated to do:
Jack Black’s Line Smoother Oil-Free Moisturizer improves texture and helps even out minor skin discolorations, leaving skin smoother and younger-looking. Natural fruit acids—eight percent glycolic acid, a natural acid found in sugar cane—help minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by sloughing off the top layer of dead skin cells, revealing softer skin hidden beneath the surface. The quick-absorbing formula provides intense yet lightweight moisturization with no lingering greasy feel.

The benefits of a topical antioxidant—one of the gold standards of dermatology—is as simple as adding a little sprinkle of this easy-to-use vitamin C powder to your moisturizer. Clinical Results: In a scientific test performed on 22 volunteers after 28 days’ use, results included:

Product Name: pores no more® Mattifying Hydrator Pore Minimizing Gel
Long Description:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Oily
✔ Combination

What it is:
A lightweight gel that simultaneously mattifies and hydrates for up to eight hours while minimizing the appearance of pores.

Solutions for:
- Oiliness
- Dryness
- Pores

If you want to know more…
Skin has a matte finish that feels soft and hydrated for up to 8 hours, and pores look instantly smaller. With regular use, pores are less clogged and skin is less shiny.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Erase shine while keeping skin hydrated with this light, refreshing gel. It contains a smart sponge polysaccharide that's able to distinguish between sebum and water, so it pulls oil from the skin while leaving hydration levels intact. Its light-diffusing powders blur pores for a smooth, fresh finish. Long-term, botanical extracts from blue iris and willow bark purify and clean out pores while silica microsponges prevent pore walls from getting slack (one reason they look larger).

What else you need to know:
Don't trust the natural instinct to soak up oil with gobs of drying products when you have shiny skin. Stripping skin of all moisture actually revs oil production, worsening breakouts and further clogging pores.
Ingredients:
-Smart Sponge Polysaccharide: Pulls oil from the skin while leaving hydration levels intact.
-Long-term, Botanical Extracts from Blue Iris and Willow Bark: Purify and clean out pores.
-Silica Microsponges: prevent pore walls from getting slack to help tighten their appearance.
-Light-Diffusing Powders: Instantly blur the look of pores and imperfections.

Capture Youth offers five targeted serums to meet the specific needs of each skin type. Enriched with antioxidant-rich iris extract, each serum is infused with a naturally-derived active ingredient to target and treat a specific skin concern: dullness, dryness, lack of firmness, oily skin, and redness. These serums are formulated to be used with the universal antioxidant cream for maximum efficacy.

- Glow Booster Serum (to target dullness): vitamin C and AHA combine to brighten and even skin.
- Plump Filler Serum (for dryness/lack of density): hyaluronic acid from fermented wheat hydrates and replenishes the skin to make it appear fuller and more supple.
- Lift Sculptor Serum (for lack of firmness/wrinkles): polyphenols derived from a tea blend boost elastin production to visibly lift and sculpt the skin for firmer, more defined skin contours.
- Matte Maximizer Serum (for oily skin): lactic acid derived from sugar cane regulates excess sebum to help reduce shine and refine pores.
- Redness Soother Serum (for red, irritated skin): natural peptides from cotton reduce redness and irritation for a smoother, more even complexion.
- Intense Rescue Age-Delay Revitalizing Oil-Serum (for dry, dehydrated skin): intensive, lipid-replenishing oil-serum that strengthens the skin's natural barrier to help repair dryness on the skin's surface and maintain hydration.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

This highly concentrated solid serum delivers potent actives overnight for a youthful-looking, glowing complexion in the morning. This unique formula breaks into a serum on application and melts into the skin to provide a smooth, supple, and radiant complexion in as little as 10 days.

- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

This product is noncomedogenic, dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, and alcohol-free.

After 10 days:
- 98% of subjects reported skin texture appeared softer and smoother
- 93% of subjects reported skin suppleness was restored

After 28 days:
- 99% of subjects reported skin appeared revitalized and felt refreshed and re-energized
- 91% of subjects reported skin was visibly firmer and more toned
- 90% of subjects reported fine lines and wrinkles were visibly plumped

-Alguronic Acid: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as brightens the overall appearance of the skin.

-Coconut Water: Highly concentrated water packed with essential amino acids, antioxidants, and phytonutrients.
-Ribose: Helps improve skin firmness, smoothness, and suppleness, making skin appear revitalized and less dull.

What Else You Need to Know: With a specially designed auto-dropper, just one powerful drop is the optimal dosage for each application. The concentrated formula with InfinitPower Technology visibly plumps skin from within, restoring visible bounciness and suppleness.

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.
Ingredients:
-Pitera™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's natural moisturizing factors; contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and acids to condition skin's natural functions.

Peptides are chains of amino acids (the building blocks of protein) that are essential to human life. They function as messengers in the skin, allowing the epidermis and dermis to communicate more efficiently. As we age, communication diminishes within the skin resulting in fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity. Peptides improve cell communication by sending specific signals that affect skin's response.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

-SYN®-AKE: Advanced myo-relaxing peptide smooths skin yielding up to a 52 percent reduction in the appearance of wrinkles*; mimics the activity of walgerin 1, a peptide found in the snake venom of the Temple Viper.
-RENOVAGE®: Patented anti-aging ingredient that reduces the appearance of pigmented spots by up to 56 percent and increases moisturization up to 58 percent.*
-DYNALIFT®: Natural sorghum stalk juice tightens and smooths skin.
*Based on supplier data.

Product Name: Dark Spots No More® Triple Acid Spot Minimizing Concentrate
Highlights: Best for Dry, Combo, Normal Skin; Good for: Dark spots; Niacinamide; Hypoallergenic; Without Parabens ; Vegan
Long Description:
What it is: A targeted, daily concentrate with 21 percent brightening agents to help fade the look of stubborn dark spots, such as sun spots, age spots, post-acne scars, and melasma, before, during, and after dark spot formation.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, and Dullness and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- 10% Azelaic Acid Derivative: Water soluble and more tolerated version of azelaic acid that visibly brightens skin tone.
- 3% Tranexamic Acid: Clinical-grade acid, widely used in dermatology to prevent discoloration.
- 2% Phytic Acid: A resurfacing ingredient derived from rice to exfoliate skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

What Else You Need to Know: Stubborn dark spots take a stubborn solution. This highly concentrated spot minimizer targets melanin synthesis to help visibly reduce the number, intensity, and size of existing spots. A clinically proven 15 percent complex of three powerhouse acids—zelaic acid derivative, tranexamic acid, and phytic acid—combine with percent niacinamide, and plankton and turmeric extracts to target only the discolored areas, not the skin around them, while soothing botanicals help counteract irritation. So potent, it has a visible effect on existing age spots, sun spots, melasma, and post-acne marks. As the intensity and range of spots is targeted over time, the complexion appears increasingly brighter, more even, and youthful. It’s a good thing this concentrate as smart as the spots are stubborn.

Clinical Results: In an instrumental evaluation and self-assessment conducted on 27 volunteers:
- 89% showed a reduction in the visible size of the dark spot after 7 days of use
- 89% reported product reduces the appearance of dark spots after 28 days of use
- 93% reported product promotes a more even, uniform look after 56 days of use
Ingredients:
-10% Azelaic Acid Derivative: Water soluble and more tolerated version of azelaic acid that visibly brightens skin tone.
-3% Tranexamic Acid: Clinical-grade acid, widely used in dermatology to prevent discoloration.
-2% Phytic Acid: A resurfacing ingredient derived from rice to exfoliate skin.

Highlights: Good for: Dark Circles; Good for: Dullness/Uneven Texture; Hyaluronic Acid; Fragrance Free; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
What it is: A complexion-boosting and wrinkle-preventing serum that revitalizes tired, dull, uneven skin for a healthy glow from within—apply after your moisturizer, during the day, use under or over makeup, or mix with your foundation or primer.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Pores, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Formulation: Lightweight Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Polygonum Bistorta Root: Potent anti-aging ingredient, evens out skin tone.
- Wild Rose Extract: Refines the appearance of pores.
- Purslane: A strong antioxidant with high levels of vitamins A, C, E, and omega-3 fatty acids, supports skin health and reduces the visible signs of irritation.
- Light-Reflecting Pigments (Iron Oxide, Tin Oxide, and Silicate Minerals): For a subtle, youthful radiance and even complexion.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Active ingredient polygonum bistorta root acts as an antimicrobial that also targets the signs of aging, optimizing skin tone. Wild rose extract refines the look of pores, giving the complexion a more even appearance. Purslane is a strong antioxidant that supports that body’s natural skin regeneration.

As an aesthetic doctor with a background in anti-inflammatory medicine, Dr. Sturm is committed to treating the skin with scientifically-proven ingredients and non-aggressive natural extracts. The three pillars of Dr. Barbara Sturm Molecular Cosmetics—hydration, boosting the skin’s natural barrier function, and reducing the visible signs of irritation—help to promote healthy skin that glows from within over time.

Long Description:
What it is:
A moisturizer with breakthrough Telo-5™ technology that supports antiaging, targeting the appearance of wrinkles, fines lines, and the signs of aging.

What it is formulated to do:
As we age, fine lines, wrinkles, dryness, and sagging skin occur. Age Arrest’s advanced formula is improves the appearance of skin’s firmness and elasticity, skin discoloration, while it significantly moisturizes skin. Its revolutionary Telo-5™ Technology, based on Nobel Prize* winning research on the youthful benefits of prolonging the life of telomeres, is designed to reduce the signs of aging and deliver a rejuvenated, youthful-looking complexion. An integral third step in Kate Somerville’s three Steps to Glowing Skin, moisturizing is key to achieving glowing, radiant skin.
*Disclaimer: The Nobel Prize® is a registered trademark of the Nobel Foundation. The trademark holder is not affiliated with Kate Somerville and does not sponsor or endorse this product.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is clinically tested to be safe for sensitive skin. Kate Somerville has been certified cruelty-free by PETA, solidifying the brand’s commitment to never test their products or ingredients on animals.

Research results:
In an independent clinical study after 4 weeks:
- 90% of women reported highly significant improvement in skin firmness and elasticity
- 93% of women reported highly significant improvement in skin discoloration and skin tone evenness

After 6 weeks:
- 93% of women said their skin felt hydrated and moisturized
Ingredients:
-Age-defying Peptide: Contains anti-glycation properties; helps to reduce the degradation of collagen and improve the appearance of firmness and lifting.
-Bio-Ferment Extract of Laminaria Kelp: Works synergistically with skin’s natural Hyaluronic Acid to help diminish the appearance of wrinkles.
-Proprietary Blend of Sea Whip Extract and Algae Plasma: Provides immediate and lasting soothing of sensitive skin.

As an aesthetic doctor with a background in anti-inflammatory medicine, Dr. Sturm is committed to treating the skin with scientifically-proven ingredients and non-aggressive natural extracts. The three pillars of Dr. Barbara Sturm Molecular Cosmetics—hydration, boosting the skin’s natural barrier function, and reducing the visible signs of irritation—help to promote healthy skin that glows from within over time.

Long Description:
What it is: A gentle, non-drying blemish treatment that absorbs oil while minimizing flaking or drying of the skin.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness

Formulation: Gel

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Naturally Derived Salicylic Acid from Willow Bark: Helps clear the appearance of blemishes without irritation.
- Maritime Pine and Thyme Complex: Soothes skin, supports the blemish recovery process, and reduces the potential of scarring.
- Prebiotic Chlorella Extract: Nourishes healthy skin bacteria to diminish the look of blemishes.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This skin-loving acne formula contains salicylic acid, which is a fast-acting, non-drying solution for bothersome blemishes and pores.

Product Name: One Essential Skin Boosting Super Serum
Highlights: Good for: Dullness/Uneven Texture; Best for Dry, Combo, Normal Skin; Without Sulfates SLS & SLES; Without Parabens ; Without Phthalates
Long Description:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Combination
✔ Dry

What it is:
A powerful serum that detoxifies, regenerates, and boosts skin for a revitalized complexion.

Solutions for:
- Dullness and uneven texture

If you want to know more…
Daily, skin faces an onslaught of aggressors including UV rays, stress, and pollution. The solution: the new One Essential, with a more powerful formula that targets 100 percent of both outdoor (microparticles, heavy metals) and—for the first time—indoor toxins (per an in vitro test on ingredients) such as carpet, glue, varnishes, and electronic devices. This Super Serum is the fundamental first step, before any other skincare product, for a revitalizing effect. When applied twice per day, One Essential purifies and strengthens the skin, and the effectiveness of your usual skincare routine is boosted and prolonged by up to four times.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
The source of the Red Hibiscus is the Dior Garden located in the heart of the Koro Ecological and Cultural Site. In this garden, covering 20 hectares, nearly 190 plant species flourish, representing an astonishing 18 percent of all species found in Burkina Faso. This remarkable site was selected due to its distinctive geology and the richness of its soil. More than a hectare is entirely devoted to cultivating the hibiscus sabdariffa, or red hibiscus.

The Dior Research Center studied the red hibiscus flower and discovered extraordinary detoxifying power. Red hibiscus extract has been shown to stimulate the recycling process of toxins that have penetrated the cell's lung.

One Essential quadruples the effects of active ingredients in the skincare products that follow (in vitro test on different major anti-aging ingredients) like retinol, vitamin C, longoza, hyaluronic acid, and bifidus for lasting radiance.

Research results:
In a consumer test on 60 women, after 7 days:
- 98% more beautiful skin
- 98% plumped skin
- 95% fresher skin
- 95% smoothed skin texture

After 1 month:
- 100% more beautiful skin
- 100% plumped skin
- 98% fresher skin
- 95% smoothed skin texture
Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric/Succinic Triglyceride, Alcohol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Maltitol, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-32, Peg-8, Decyloxazolidinone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Tetrasodium Edta, Parfum (Fragrance), Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Faex (Yeast Extract), Sodium Hydroxide, Lecithin, Squalane, Pyrus Cydonia Seed Extract, Alcaligenes Polysaccharides, Dimethylmethoxy Chromanol, Adenosine, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitol, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Tocopheryl Phosphate, Algin, Aframomum Angustifolium Seed Extract, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Limonene, Haberlea Rhodopensis Leaf Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Cellulose Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Lilium Candidum Bulb Extract, Phaeodactylum Tricornutum Extract, Dehydroacetic Acid, Bht, Tocopherol.

Long Description:
What it is:
A perfecting smoothing serum to improve visible signs of aging while helping restore the texture and radiance of skin.

What it is formulated to do:
Here is the perfect solution for skin that is beginning to show first signs of aging: lack of radiance and smoothness, and fine lines and wrinkles. It restores skin to its ideal beauty immediately and over time. Skin perfecting illuminators diminish the look of imperfections. Over time, clary sage helps improve smoothness, and the powerful line polish complex helps support skin’s natural collagen. Light is brought back to skin, texture is visibly improved, pores appear minimized, and lines and wrinkles are visibly diminished.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
This product contains 92 percent of total ingredients from natural origin. It is noncomedogenic, dermatologist tested, and clinically proven.

Crafted with the most precious botanicals and natural ingredients, Darphin’s beautifully aromatic formulas offer the perfect blend of pleasure and performance. When paired with Darphin’s proprietary massage techniques, the experience is enhanced. Experience the pleasure of institute-inspired application secrets, which Pierre Darphin believed enhanced product delivery into the skin. These massage techniques support natural microcirculation, soothe the skin and the senses, and enhance the benefits of your skin care routine, promoting a rosy glow and a sensation of ultimate well-being.
Ingredients:
Line Polish Complex™ (Centella Asiatica, Knotweed, and Hibiscus Extracts).

Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.

Long Description:
What it is:
A serum that instantly replenishes and repairs, promoting smoother facial features and more defined-looking contours for women 50 and up.

What it is formulated to do:
This exceptional antiaging treatment lifts the features, replenishes the skin, reshapes and redefines the look of contours and the face shape, and diminishes the appearance of age spots. Precious narrow-leaf plantain combined with organic harungana extract helps protect the facial contours. It redefines the appearance of contours of the face and preserves harmonious facial contours. In combination, organic harungana extract, a "healing” tree from Madagascar, improves the look of skin slackening around the chin. Organic Montpellier rock-rose extract, nicknamed the "phoenix plant," helps visibly reduce the look of age-related dark spots and restores the complexion's luminosity.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
For optimal results, follow with Super Restorative Day Cream and Super Restorative Night Cream.

Research results:
- 90% of women find their skin smoother after the first application**
- 85% of women are convinced of the effectiveness of Super Restorative Remodelling Serum *
- 77% of women find their face looks less tired*

*Satisfaction test, 377 women, 28 days
**Satisfaction test, 418 women
Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Methyl Gluceth-20, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Bisabolol, Hexylresorcinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum/Fragrance, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Plantago Lanceolata Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Atractyloides Lancea Root Extract, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Citric Acid, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Disodium Edta, Harungana Madagascariensis Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Cistus Monspeliensis Extract, Xanthan Gum, Ci 14700/Red 4, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2, Ascorbic Acid, Dextran [V2686A].

Long Description:
What it is: A brightening serum that instantly gives the complexion a more even glow, refines skin tone and texture, and reduces visible signs of pigmentation.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Extracts of Cress Sprouts: Support the reduction of melanin production, brighten skin, and combat the formation of dark and yellowish spots.
- Purslane: A strong antioxidant that stimulates the body and supports skin health and rejuvenation.
- Allantoin: Helps calm skin for a glowing, more even-looking complexion.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This serum uses natural ingredients to help brighten the skin. Cress sprouts extract brightens the skin and diminishes the appearance of dark and yellowish spots. Ginseng extract supports the skin’s own protection against free radicals, and hyaluronic acid hydrates the skin. Allantoin has a soothing and calming effect.

As an aesthetic doctor with a background in anti-inflammatory medicine, Dr. Sturm is committed to treating the skin with scientifically-proven ingredients and non-aggressive natural extracts. The three pillars of Dr. Barbara Sturm Molecular Cosmetics—hydration, boosting the skin’s natural barrier function, and reducing the visible signs of irritation—help to promote healthy skin that glows from within over time.

Long Description:
What it is: A concentrate that targets the areas where youthful volume has been lost, for redensified, flawless skin.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- The Orchidarium
- Tigernut Extract: Gives a redensifying effect.
- Rosa Multiflora Fruit Extract: Acts on the pores.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES and parabens.

What Else You Need to Know: The duo of orchids at the heart of the highly concentrated Cell Respiration™ technology regulates the level of oxygen in the skin cells. The cells can breathe again and maximize energy production, which supports natural cell regeneration for a visible reduction in the signs of aging. This technology is combined with the redensifying action of a natural origin ingredient—tigernut extract—which strengthens the structure and cohesion of the fibers, supporting the skin. It visibly improves pores, fine lines and wrinkles, and the overall complexion. The Longevity Concentrate bottle is designed to be easily recycled.

Clinical Results: Clinical test by a dermatologist on 32 women, results after twice-daily application for 1 month:
- Skin firmness +36%
- Facial contour definition +19%
- Facial volume +30%
- Visibility of pores -19%
- Complexion radiance +34%

Product Name: White Pine Meno-Reverse™ Deep Wrinkle, Plumping + Age Spot Concentrate
Long Description:
What it is: A targeted concentrate daily treatment for post-menopausal women that visibly reduces the appearance of age spots and deep wrinkles in 14 days.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Meno-Reverse Technology: A natural peptide blend derived from artichokes that is clinically proven to restore the skin look and feel to pre-menopausal levels.
- White Pine: Derived from the oldest living trees in Europe, KORRES’ proprietary ingredient powerfully supports protein production, promotes skin elasticity, and visibly improves wrinkles and age spots.
- Soybean Fiber: Anti-wrinkle ingredient that supports natural collagen synthesis, providing an anti-wrinkle effect comparable to retinol.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Menopause causes a 36 percent reduction in cell reproductivity. The Deep Wrinkle, Plumping + Age Spot Concentrate is specifically designed for post-menopausal women and helps to reduce the appearance of age spots and deep wrinkles.

Clinical Results:
In a consumer-perception study of 32 subjects:
- 91% of post-menopausal women saw visible improvement in deep wrinkles in 28 days

In a study determined by an expert clinical grader on 36 subjects:
- 97% of post-menopausal women reported a significant reduction in the appearance of pore size in 14 days

During a consumer-perception study of 36 subjects:
- In 14 days, participants reported skin looked 10 years younger

- 100% of women showed a dramatic improvement in skin hydration

It is also formulated with Orchid Noble Light™ Technology that combines an extract of the precious orchid dendrobium nobile with a visibly brightening peptide, acting on sources of skin dullness and helping to recreate the effect of light on the skin.

Highlights: Best for Oily, Combo, Normal Skin; Good for: Pores ; Hyaluronic Acid; Fragrance Free; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
What it is: A fast-absorbing hyaluronic serum was specially developed to meet the beauty needs of darker skin tones.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Hyaluronic Acid: Leaves the skin looking refreshed and radiant.
- Purslane: A strong antioxidant that stimulates the body and supports skin health and rejuvenation.
- Lumicol: Evens out skin tone and gives the complexion a fresh and even glow.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This serum is packed with a highly concentrated balance of long- and short-chain hyaluronic molecules for potent hydration. When used daily, the hyaluronic serum diminishes the appearance of imperfections and acts as a super moisture booster to reduce the formation of wrinkles caused by dehydration.

As an aesthetic doctor with a background in anti-inflammatory medicine, Dr. Sturm is committed to treating the skin with scientifically-proven ingredients and non-aggressive natural extracts. The three pillars of Dr. Barbara Sturm Molecular Cosmetics—hydration, boosting the skin’s natural barrier function, and reducing the visible signs of irritation—help to promote healthy skin that glows from within over time.
